I too would be interested in see that. I recently purchased a Namban
tsub awhile in Japan that has Hozon kanteisho and is quite nice. Another
twist on this is that Namban tsuba are quite well thought of in Japan,
it is the west that seems to have a lower opinion of them. Perhaps as
they do not come off as quite Japanese on initial study.

http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/personal/tsuba_collection/namban.html 
<http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/personal/tsuba_collection/namban.html>

Richard Turner
